Package dialogs

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApproverApproveCommentDialogFragment
    Custom Alert Dialog for the approval of claims.
    ApproverChoiceDialogFragment
    Custom Alert Dialog for approvers functionality when he long-clicks a submitted claim, including the ability to approve and return.
    ApproverCommentDialogFragment
    A custom dialog to allow an approver to add the mandatory comment when returning a claim.
    ClaimantChoiceDialogFragment
    This is a custom Alert Dialog for when a claimant long clicks a claim, giving the abilities to edit, view, submit, and delete.
    ClaimantExpenseDialogFragment
    Custom array adapter to get basic functionality out of expenses, including ability to view, edit, delete,toggle the incompleteness indicator and add a receipt.
    ClaimantGetDestinationLocationDialog
    A custom array alert dialog that presents the options to use the home location, add via gps, or pick it from a google map.
    ClaimantGetExpenseLocationDialog
    Custom Alert Dialog to get location information for expense items from home location, GPS, or from a map.
    ClaimantHomeLocationDialog
    Dialog pop-up to allow the user to set their home location.
    DestinationDialogFragment
    This is a custom dialog fragment for adding a destination-reason pair to a claim.
    EditTagFragment
    This is a custom UI-fragment for editing a tag.
    FilterFragmentDialog
    This is a custom dialog fragment for choosing which tags to filter the claims by.
    MapSearchAlertDialog
    An Alert Dialog that allows the user to search a location and add it to either an expense item, TraverItinerary item, or home location.
    MapViewAlertDialog
    An alert dialog that displays a set location, from UserLocationManager, on a map.
    TagChoiceFragment
    This is a custom dialog fragment for Editing tags.
    TagDialogFragment
    This is a custom dialog fragment for adding a destination-reason pair to a claim.
